name: A Big Home
description:
Short game made for global game jam, with the theme of "Home"

A kitchen is often described as the heart of the home. So we decided to place our game in a kitchen for the theme.

 You will have to navigate your way through a kitchen when the main character shrinks down to toy size. Normal everyday objects now become an obstacle. See if you can make your way to the top cupboard and find out why you have turned small.

Global Game Jam 2019 Page
